titleStmt.title: For England's information, reformation, great joy, peace, and consolation; and for her great honour, and exaltation, and for the great shame, contempt and terror of the Turk, the Pope, and the Devil, and all the workers of evil
titleStmt.author: Varney, John.

notesStmt.note: By John Varney, whose name appears on S4r.
With errata at end of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
